title: Shazia Marri lambastes PTI for violent atmosphere during Punjab LG polls
content:
KARACHI, Jul 17 (APP):Federal Minister for Poverty Alleviation and Social Safety and Central Information Secretary of PPP-P Shazia Atta Marri on Sunday said that PTI’s leadership tried to create the atmosphere of violence and confrontation during by-election in Punjab province.
She said that Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf (PTI) promoted abuse and hatred culture in the country and now it has become a symbol of abuse, forgery and misrepresentation.
She further said that Imran Khan’s politics has ended after his removal through vote of no-confidence.
